results.question: 查詢8802倉庫的所有庫存明細
results.sql:
SELECT item_no, item_no AS warehouse_no, location_no, unit, SUM(existing_stocks) AS existing_stocks
FROM mart_inventory_wide
GROUP BY item_no, item_no, location_no, unit
LIMIT 100

results.question: 查詢料號10-0001的基本資料
results.sql:
SELECT item_no, item_no AS warehouse_no, location_no, unit, SUM(existing_stocks) AS existing_stocks, item_no
FROM mart_inventory_wide
WHERE item_no = '10-0001'
GROUP BY item_no, item_no, location_no, unit, item_no
LIMIT 100

GROUP BY item_no, item_no, status
LIMIT 100
